fields.name: There is one thing certain in life:
Abilities:
fields.value:
- Visions of Grandeur (Night): Choose a role. You will be notified whether the role exists in the current game or not. If it does, you will receive a list of three people with one of them being the role that you chose.
- Dark Fate (Day, 1 use): Predict a player to die tonight. If you are correct, that player will show up as Cleaned in the graveyard, you will learn their role and will, and they will not be able to access dead chat.
